name: Scrimshaw Demo
description:
Hello Scrim Scrimmers. This is the page for the Scrimshaw Demo. It's a short, story driven experience that will help myself and my team determine how to proceed with the creation of Scrimshaw. I hope to get feedback on the game, good and bad, and I'll continue to change and improve it alongside the development of the main game.

Here's a feedback form to fill out if you'd like to. I'd very much appreciate it: https://forms.gle/RPSzq42zbsoYjUkh7

Other than that, have fun, explore, break stuff and then tell me all about it.

P.S. Sadly the system audio recording quality on my PC is below lapel mic in a wind tunnel levels of quality, so guess you'll have to play the game for the true sonic experience
